name: Randoom
overview: A homebrew game by Dozznar with music by Narciso Quintana Varo aka narcisound. Chase the elusive dice that run through the game's 31 screens but be careful, only catch the one that is the same color or you will lose a life. You get extra points for quickly concatenating cubes. At 100 points you will get an extra life that will help you in your goal of locking up all of the cubes.
